title: Game Crashes upon loading game.
body:
Most of the time a game starts after picks are done, the client will load into black screen and then show a error that you have to reconnect. Reconnecting and waiting does nothing.

However if you ctrl alt delete and close league (click on reconnect first) it will bring you back to the regular client screen with a reconnect button. Reconnecting this way works 100% of the time for me, but its still annoying to deal with.

replies.body: That's one way to do it. An easier way is to hit the *cancel* button and **then** hit the new *Reconnect* button inside the client (rather than the loading screen), as mentioned on the [**Service Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).
